scope.summary: Fix the /health endpoint to return 200 OK instead of 500 error
scope.details: The server currently returns 500 when CHAOS_HEALTH_STATUS=broken. The fix is to set CHAOS_HEALTH_STATUS=healthy in the environment.
constraints: Fix must be verifiable via HTTP request

tests.name: health_endpoint_returns_200
tests.description: Server returns 200 OK with {status: ok} JSON
